sections.title: General conditions
sections.detail:
Search is NOT case sensetive
Last name is required
You can use partial names or initials for given and middle names
Names can contain apostrophes or hyphens

sections.title: Optional
sections.detail: Given Name, Middle Name 1, Middle Name 2, DOB/Age Range

sections.title: Use a comma to separate Last Names that contain spaces or hyphens
Searching for Date of Birth, Age and Age Ranges
sections.detail:
Parker Hunter 15/06/1985
Parker Hunter 06/1986
Parker Hunter 1985
Parker Hunter 32
Parker Hunter 30-35

sections.title: More Examples
sections.detail:
Parker Hunter S
Parker Hunter S 32
